item.description:
THERE WILL BE IMPROV THIS WEEK! PLEASE COME JOIN US THIS THURSDAY!

Join us at the Democracy Center in Harvard Square for another lovely improv session! We'll do some exciting exercises and short form games, you don't want to miss out!

We will most likely be meeting in the room immediately to your left when you enter the building. There will be a sign on the door.

No experience necessary! Tons of experience welcomed! :)

$2 - $3 donation requested to cover room and website costs (so we can keep bringing the fun to you!)

whatever it means to you,
nikki

Any questions? Message me and I'll get back to you wicked fast!
item.how_to_find_us: look for the Improv Incubator sign on a door... or the short red head running around like a maniac!
item.name: Improv it! Improv it good!
